question: What are the natives of the cold tundra region in Canada and Greenland called?
explanation:
Eskimos - Natives of the cold tundra region in Canada and Greenland. They are sub-divided
into the following subgroups:
Alaskan: Eskimo inhabitants of northwestern Alaska in US
Caribou: Eskimos of northern Canada westward of Hudson Bay
Greenland: Eskimo inhabitants of southern Greenland
Labrador: Eskimos of northern Canada eastward of Hudson Bay
